name: Burnout Legends
summary: The Burnout series goes portable with Burnout Legends for the PSP. You can play through redesigned tracks from the earlier Burnout games in nine different game modes, including Crash mode and Pursuit mode. Burnout Legends also contains new unlockable cars and content. You can challenge up to four other players to battle wirelessly in a single game or an entire customizable championship.
info:
• 开发: Criterion Games
